akn:content.akn:p: (a) Not later than April 1 of each year, the Federal Maritime Commission shall submit a report to Congress. The report shall include the results of its investigations, a summary of its transactions, the purposes for which all of its expenditures were made, and any recommendations for legislation.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Report on Foreign Laws and Practices.—

akn:content.akn:p: (b) The Commission shall include in its annual report to Congress—
(c) In this section, the term “certain covered services” has the meaning given the term in section 40102.
(d) The Federal Maritime Commission shall publish, and annually update, on the website of the Commission—
